attributes.action: Scrap the 3pm Saturday football blackout as its now outdated.
attributes.additional_details: Given the change in paid TV it’s no longer relevant to push people to attending life football matches.
attributes.background: Allow televised football at 3pm on Saturdays in the UK.

rejection.details: The 3pm Saturday "blackout" is a rule set by professional football associations and leagues, not the UK Government or Parliament. It is for them to decide whether to remove the "blackout" or not.
